content: नद् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (नदति, नदित) {@--1@} To sound, resound, thunder (as a cloud &c); वामश्चायं नदति मधुरं चातकस्ते सगंधः <ls>Me. 9</ls>; नदत्याकाशगंगायाः स्रोतस्युद्दामदिग्गजे <ls>R. 1. 78</ls>; <ls>Śi. 5. 63</ls>; <ls>Bk. 2. 4.</ls> {@--2@} To speak, shout, cry, roar, (often with words like शब्द, स्वन, नाद &c. as object); ननाद बलवन्नादं, शब्दं घोरतरं नदंति <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--3@} To vibrate. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (नादयति-ते) {@--1@} To fill with noise, make noisy or resonant. {@--2@} To cause to make a sound. --WITH उद् to roar, cry (loudly), bellow (as a bull); <ls>Ku. 1. 56.</ls>
